body_html: Yeah, I have been returning the (dense) indicies / values corresponding to the matrix from the collate function, and then using these to construct the sparse matrix prior to feeding it into forward.

body: Yeah, I have been returning the (dense) indicies / values corresponding to the matrix from the collate function, and then using these to construct the sparse matrix prior to feeding it into forward.
